bug.author: LuQQiu
bug.summary: Raft Journal duplicate shutdown copycat server
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.0.0-preview Describe the bug When raft journal system is running, I tried to stop it from calling AbstractJournalSystem.stop() which will trigger <denchmark-code>mRaftJournalWriter.close(); mServer.shutdown().get(2, TimeUnit.SECONDS); </denchmark-code>
but FaultTolerantAlluxioMasterProcess.start will wait for secondary state and call mJournalSystem.losePrimacy(); in which we do the similar close and shutdown things. <denchmark-code>mRaftJournalWriter.close(); mServer.shutdown().get(); </denchmark-code>
The duplicate shutdown copycat server will throw exceptions because it is already been shut down. To Reproduce When changing the journal type to embedded journal in LocalAlluxioCluster, master process is unable to stop.
